s: December 11, 2023 - For my house, there was no connection ... a garage door opener, a hardware-store-brand thermostat, and a few other brands. As noted previously, some manufacturers were covered, but the items I had were not, like certain smart plugs from TP-Link. Kevin C. Tofel, at the Stacey on IOT blog, noted similar discrepancies in device coverage in his Homey Pro review.
